product.cushioning: Plush and responsive CloudTec cushioning with Zero-Gravity foam for a soft, bouncy, lightweight feel.
product.breathability: Engineered mesh upper, partly made from recycled polyester, promotes excellent airflow.
product.short_description: Experience the next evolution of premium comfort with the On Womens Cloud 6 Sneakers. Purpose-built for the modern woman's lifestyle, the Cloud 6 refines the perfect balance of plush cushioning and lightweight performance. Engineered with a redesigned upper crafted from 100% recycled polyester, this shoe offers a sock-like fit that adapts seamlessly to the contours of your foot, providing enhanced flexibility and all-day wearability. The iconic CloudTec? pods in the midsole deliver that signature soft landing with every step, while the updated Zero-Gravity foam ensures a bouncy, responsive feel without any excess weight. Whether you're navigating a busy workday, exploring a new city, or simply enjoying a casual weekend, the Cloud 6 provides unparalleled underfoot comfort. The speed-lacing system allows for a quick, secure fit, while the reflective details add a layer of safety for low-light adventures. More than just a sneaker, the On Womens Cloud 6 is a statement of Swiss-engineered design, merging sustainable materials with cutting-edge technology.
product.about_this_item: Elastic speed-lace system, Reflective accents, Cushioned collar and removable insole, Designed for training , Ultra lightweight and breathable design
